Dentist - phobia Specific ask : Event Planner,Corporates,Makeup Artist
top_problem_solved: Case 1 A patient from Africa came to replace a crown/cap in front teeth due to discoloration. During checkup I doubted something major is there beneath that tooth. sent patient for CT scan. Results of CT scan showed Radicular Cyst ( abnormal non-cancerous growth filled with pus). Immediately scheduled a surgery and simultaneously saved tooth and adjacent structures and replaced crown within a month. Case 2 : A well known Doctor was suffering from severe pain in lower right region of teeth. couldnt eat,sleep or work since 2 years. showed to multiple dentist but didnt get right guidance and permanent solution. I was his last hope. We gave him permanent solution as it was a long standing case,damage was too much . He was very happy and remembers me whenever he eats his favourite dishes without thinking twice

name: Niraj Jagwani
my_business: At TRooTech, we engineer intelligent, future-ready business solutions that combine the power of AI, CRM, and custom software development. As a HubSpot Gold Partner and Salesforce Partner, we specialize in offering intelligent customer experiences and future-ready CRM ecosystems that empower teams to work faster, sell smarter, and engage better.
top_product: At TRooTech, our top offerings solve real business challenges with precision and scale. Our three most in-demand services are: HubSpot CRM Implementation: We help fast-growing businesses set up, customize, and fully leverage HubSpot for sales, marketing, and service alignment. From pipeline setup to automation and integrations, we ensure your CRM actually works for your business — not the other way around. AI Solutions: We develop tailored AI systems — including intelligent process automation, data-driven insights, and GenAI-powered tools — that help enterprises boost efficiency and make smarter decisions faster. Custom Software Development: Whether it’s a platform, portal, mobile app, or complex enterprise system, we build future-ready solutions that are scalable, secure, and tailored to your unique workflows. Our sweet spot? Mid-to-large enterprises ready to modernize, optimize, or innovate through technology.
ideal_referral: An ideal referral for me is a mid-sized to enterprise-level company in the US, Europe, APAC or MENA region that either: - Struggles with an underperforming CRM, or - Hasn’t implemented a CRM yet but is scaling fast and needs structure for sales, marketing, or customer success. If a business leader says, “We need a better way to manage customers” or “We’re growing but lack visibility into our sales pipeline,” — that’s the perfect time to bring in TRooTech. We specialize in tailored Salesforce and HubSpot implementations that align with real business goals.
top_problem_solved: We help growing enterprises that are struggling with disconnected systems, manual workflows, or underutilized CRMs. Whether a business is: - Lost in spreadsheets instead of tracking deals through a proper sales pipeline, - Using a CRM that’s poorly set up and barely adopted, - Or trying to scale with no automation, no AI, and no visibility — We step in with tailored HubSpot CRM setups, intelligent AI-driven automation, and custom software solutions that bring order, clarity, and growth.
my_favourite_bni_story: As someone who just joined, my favorite BNI story so far isn’t about referrals — it’s about how genuinely the members try to understand what I do. In a world of surface-level networking, it’s refreshing to see people actually listen, ask thoughtful questions, and want to refer the right kind of business. That level of interest and support is rare — and it’s what made me feel like I joined the right room.
